Sorrow's children (2:42) -- Autumn on your mind (3:57) -- Song for an uncertain lady (4:42) -- Let tomorrow be (3:25) -- Only time will make you see (2:01) -- Maybelline (3:15) -- Lisa (3:37) -- The one I thought was there (3:19) -- Child for now (6:39) -- Waiting for an old friend (7:09) -- Africa (4:11).
